      • init

        public void init()

      • createTable

        public void createTable(java.lang.String strTableName,
                        java.lang.String strClusteringKeyColumn,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> htblColNameType)
                 throws DBAppException
        Method 2.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table Name
        strClusteringKeyColumn - Clustering Key Column Name
        htblColNameType - Hashtable of mappings of column names and column types. Only five types are allowed:\n 1. java.lang.Integer 2. java.lang.Double 3. java.lang.String 4. java.lang.Boolean 5. java.util.Date 6. java.awt.Polygon
        Throws:
        DBAppException - Case 1: Table already exists. Case 2: Wrong data type: should be java.lang.String or java.lang.Integer or java.lang.Double or java.lang.Boolean or java.util.Date or java.awt.Polygon.

      • saveTableMetadata

        public void saveTableMetadata(java.lang.String strTableName,
                              java.lang.String strClusteringKeyColumn,
                              java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> htblColNameType)
                       throws DBAppException
        Method 3.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table Name
        strClusteringKeyColumn - Clustering Key Column Name
        htblColNameType - Hashtable of mappings of column names and column types. Only five types are allowed:\n 1. java.lang.Integer 2. java.lang.Double 3. java.lang.String 4. java.lang.Boolean 5. java.util.Date 6. java.awt.Polygon
        Throws:
        DBAppException - Case 1: Table already exists. Case 2: Wrong data type: should be java.lang.String or java.lang.Integer or java.lang.Double or java.lang.Boolean or java.util.Date or java.awt.Polygon.

      • hasIndex

        public boolean hasIndex(java.lang.String tableName,
                        java.lang.String columnName)
        Method 10.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Table Name.
        columnName - Column name.
        Returns:
        Returns true if that column has index. If the table name is invalid, or column name is invalid, or there is no index on that column, false is returned.

      • allIndexes

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allIndexes(java.lang.String strTableName)
        Method 11.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table name.
        Returns:
        An list of all columns that are indexed using a B+ tree (not of type Polygon). If the table name is invalid, or the table has no indexed columns, an empty list is returned.

      • allPolIndexes

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allPolIndexes(java.lang.String strTableName)
        Method 12.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table name
        Returns:
        A list of columns that are indexed using a R tree (are of type Polygon). If the table name is invalid, or the table has no indexed columns, an empty list is returned.

        strKey - Clustering Key Value
        htblColNameValue - Hashtable of mapping between column names and column values.
        Throws:
        DBAppException - Case 1: Table is not found. Case 2: Incompatible data types for a column in hashtable. Case 3: Incompatible data type for the clustering key value.

      • filter

        public java.util.ArrayList<TupleExtraPointer> filter(java.lang.String strTableName,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> indexedColumns,
                                                     java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> indexedHashtable,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> NonindexedColumns,
                                                     java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> NonIndexedHashtable,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> indexedPolColumns,
                                                     java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> indexedPolHashtable,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> NonindexedPolColumns,
                                                     java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> NonindexedPolHashtable)
        Method 19.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table Name
        indexedColumns - ArrayList of indexed columns names in the WHERE clause. [Not of type polygon]
        indexedHashtable - Hashtable of the mappings in the WHERE clause.
        NonindexedColumns - ArrayList of non-indexed columns names in the WHERE clause. [Not of type polygon]
        NonIndexedHashtable - Hashtable of the mappings in the WHERE clause.
        indexedPolColumns - ArrayList of indexed columns names in the WHERE clause. [Of type polygon]
        indexedPolHashtable - Hashtable of the mappings in the WHERE clause.
        NonindexedPolColumns - ArrayList of non-indexed columns names in the WHERE clause. [Not of type polygon]
        NonindexedPolHashtable - Hashtable of the mappings in the WHERE clause.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of pointers to be deleted.

      • checkOperator

        public boolean checkOperator(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> x,
                             java.lang.Object parsedObjValue,
                             java.lang.String operator,
                             java.lang.String columnName)
        Method 24.
        Parameters:
        x - Single entry in a table.
        parsedObjValue - Parsed object against which the comparison is done.
        operator - Comparison operator [>, <, >=, <=, =, !=].
        columnName - Column name.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the hashtable satisfies the condition and false if the hashtable does not satisfy it.

      • shiftPage

        public void shiftPage(int tIndex,
                      java.lang.String table,
                      int m,
                      java.lang.String pagetotal,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columnsindex,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columnstype)
        Parameters:
        tIndex - Index where i want to shift down starting from.
        table - Table name.
        m - Current page number.
        pagetotal - Total number of pages of that table.

      • shiftpage2

        public void shiftpage2(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> h,
                       int tIndex,
                       java.lang.String table,
                       int m,
                       java.lang.String pagetotal,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columnsindex,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columnstype)
        Parameters:
        h - Hashtable to be shifted upwards.
        tIndex - Index where a tuples with a larger clustering key was found.
        table - Table name
        m - Current page number.
        pagetotal - Total number of pages for this table.

      • insertIntoTable

        public void insertIntoTable(java.lang.String strTableName,
                            java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> htblColNameValue)
                     throws DBAppException
        Parameters:
        strTableName - Table Name
        htblColNameValue - Hashtable of mappings between column name and column value.
        Throws:
        DBAppException - Case 1: Column Value object does not match the column type in the CSV.\n Case 2: Clustering Key was not in the hashtable, and would thus have to be null which is not allowed.\n Case 3: One of the hashtable column names is not in the CSV and is thus wrong.
